医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NCCN 领导人合作加强越南的癌症护理作为在全球范围内定义和推进高质量癌症护理的持续工作的一部分，美国领先癌症中心联盟国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN) 的领导者今天将前往越南，合作改善癌症全国各地的护理标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/NCCN-leaders-collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-care-in-Vietnam.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/NCCN-leaders-collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-care-in-Vietnam.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b8c60c8-a86d-4ea6-a2b4-8c7df5504514 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 15:42:00 -0500 NCCN leaders collaborate to enhance cancer care in Vietnam
研究深入探讨神经分歧精神病学家的生活探索自闭症精神科医生经历的开创性研究表明，不知道自己患有自闭症的精神科医生可能无法识别患者的病情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-delves-into-the-lives-of-neurodivergent-psychiatrists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-delves-into-the-lives-of-neurodivergent-psychiatrists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49e4257f-f4a4-4f91-8f0f-da31e93fee7d Fri, 01 Nov 2024 15:34:00 -0500 Study delves into the lives of neurodivergent psychiatrists
研究确定饮食选择与多发性硬化症进展之间的重要联系《Glia》杂志上新发表的研究发现了饮食选择与多发性硬化症 (MS) 进展之间的重要联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-identizes-crucial-links- Between-dietary-choices-and-progression-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-identizes-crucial-links- Between-dietary-choices-and-progression-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa579318-9663-4c92-9775-b075c5dd4e1a Fri, 01 Nov 2024 15:26:00 -0500 Research identifies crucial links between dietary choices and progression of multiple sclerosis
创新成像技术揭示胸腺结构伦敦大学学院和弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员使用专门的 X 射线技术创建了第一张完整人类胸腺的 3D 图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Innovative-imaging-technique-reveals-struct-of-the-thymus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Innovative-imaging-technique-reveals-struct-of-the-thymus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78209f92-f8af-47c2-b77d-c53104366b7f Fri, 01 Nov 2024 15:17:00 -0500 Innovative imaging technique reveals structure of the thymus
开发新型支架传感器可及早检测堵塞用于治疗人体各种堵塞的支架本身可能会被堵塞，但密歇根大学为胆管中使用的支架开发的一种新传感器有一天可能会帮助医生及早发现和治疗支架堵塞，从而帮助患者保持健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-stent-sensor-development-to-detect-blockages-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-stent-sensor-development-to-detect-blockages-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68bd1565-302a-4d0f-8f8a-57921c8d435d Fri, 01 Nov 2024 15:09:00 -0500 New stent sensor developed to detect blockages early
长期新冠患者血液中细胞因子升高解释了心脏问题昆士兰大学领导的研究发现，长期新冠患者的血液中存在炎症标记物，这可以解释为什么许多人会出现持续的心血管问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Elevated-cytokines-found-in-the-blood-of-long-COVID-sufferers-explain-heart-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Elevated-cytokines-found-in-the-blood-of-long-COVID-sufferers-explain-heart-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4cf40cb-52ed-40ac-9956-cec679a5921b Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:59:00 -0500 Elevated cytokines found in the blood of long COVID sufferers explain heart problems
多重用药与患有阿尔茨海默病的老年人的负面健康结果有关多重用药通常被定义为每天服用五种或更多药物，是影响超过 30% 老年人的一个重要的医疗保健问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Polypharmacy-linked-to-male-health-outcomes-in-older-adults-with-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Polypharmacy-linked-to-male-health-outcomes-in-older-adults-with-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a56aebb-524a-4f70-ad1c-17b98314d322 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:51:00 -0500 Polypharmacy linked to negative health outcomes in older adults with Alzheimer's
与动物病毒溢出潜力相关的关键蛋白质研究可能感染人类的​​动物病毒的科学家们发现了一种关键的蛋白质，它可以使动脉病毒家族的生物体发生溢出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Critical- Protein-linked-to-spillover-pottial-of-animal-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Critical- Protein-linked-to-spillover-pottial-of-animal-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91d507d7-2c64-42cf-b4cb-4c02f5364b44 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:42:00 -0500 Critical protein linked to spillover potential of animal viruses
虚拟瑜伽项目有望缓解慢性腰痛克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现，为期 12 周的虚拟瑜伽治疗慢性腰痛项目可能是一种可行、安全且有效的治疗选择。研究结果发表在《JAMA Network Open》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Virtual-yoga-program-shows-promise-for-chronic-low-back-pain-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Virtual-yoga-program-shows-promise-for-chronic-low-back-pain-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23232a91-1fa3-4b08-b039-66097f3cb475 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:34:00 -0500 Virtual yoga program shows promise for chronic low back pain relief
研究强调房屋隔热以抵御冬季寒冷对健康的好处冬季，寒冷的室内温度会导致血压升高，导致高血压和心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-insulated-homes-against-winter-cold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-insulated-homes-against-winter-cold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fff9ea35-efab-4116-86c3-a59965a0a803 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:25:00 -0500 Study highlights health benefits of insulating homes against winter cold
